name: itk-tubetk-wasm-builder
description: npm scripts to generate itk-wasm artifacts.

scripts.build: npm run emscripten && npm run bindgen && npm run wasi
scripts.bindgen: npx itk-wasm -b emscripten-build bindgen --output-dir wasm/typescript --package-name itk-tubetk --package-description "TubeTK is an open-source toolkit for the segmentation, registration, and analysis of tubes and surfaces in images, developed by Kitware, Inc." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/ITKTubeTK'
